data.meta_site_name: Two and a Half Men Wiki
data.text:
Krista Allen (born April 5, 1971) is an American actress and model. She is best known for her roles as Billie Reed on Days of our Lives from 1996–1999, as Jenna Avid on Baywatch Hawaii from 2000–2001, and as Bridget on What About Brian from 2006–2007. Her notable film roles include Liar Liar, Anger Management and Confessions of a Dangerous Mind. She also took the lead role in a series of softcore television movies inspired by the sex icon Emmanuelle.

Krista Allen played Charlie's ex-girlfriend Olivia in the episode "Did You Check with the Captain of the Flying Monkeys?".
